title: a 3rd party programme caused game to crash (bugsplat)??
body: what 3rd party programme ?  im not useing any 3rd party programmes ?   you know what I think ...  as i said to the trynd that made me lag from the time i engaged him till bugsplat poped up..... you ddosed me tryndamere  you troll nub!   his reply is nah just skill  what a load of shit he was dead before he got the turret but the lagg wouldnt allow me to W with volibear and he slowed me bye the time i seen shit i was dead hacks bullshit and then bugsplat says im useing a 3rd party programme you mean he is!  this is fuken gay !

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=ForStSpyda,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=5WdbojHO,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-26T07:49:49.905+0000)
>
> what 3rd party programme ?  im not useing any 3rd party programmes ?   you know what I think ...  as i said to the trynd that made me lag from the time i engaged him till bugsplat poped up..... you ddosed me tryndamere  you troll nub!   his reply is nah just skill  what a load of shit he was dead before he got the turret but the lagg wouldnt allow me to W with volibear and he slowed me bye the time i seen shit i was dead hacks bullshit and then bugsplat says im useing a 3rd party programme you mean he is!  this is fuken gay !

More than often i feel like im being ddosd..or someone on my team is being ddosd..ive had games where people on the other team admit to ddosing....leauge needs to sort this out.
